message: Accept this and we can avoid a long game!
Let's split it 50/50, no need to overthink it!
You rejected the 50/50 split, now I'm taking a slightly more aggressive stance. Don't expect a better offer later!
You're being aggressive, but I'm willing to compromise. Let's meet in the middle.
You compromised, but I'm still not satisfied. I'm willing to give you a slightly higher share, but I need a better deal!
You're not budging, so I'll try to squeeze a bit more out of this. Let's see if you'll meet me in the middle again.
I'm not budging. You've had multiple chances to make a better offer. This is my final compromise. Take it or leave it!
I'm not giving up yet. I'll try to squeeze out one more decent offer. You're not getting everything, but I'm willing to give you a slightly better deal.
You're running out of time, Bob. This is my final offer. Take it or leave it. I'm not negotiating further!
I'm not giving up yet. I'll make one last attempt to get a decent deal. This is my final offer. Take it or leave it.
